org.mitre.midiki.workshop
Class SocketUtil

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.mitre.midiki.workshop.SocketUtil
public class SocketUtil
extends java.lang.Object

A shorthand way to create PrintStreams and buffered/unbuffered DataInputStreams associated with a socket. This appears in Core Web Programming from Prentice Hall Publishers, and may be freely used or adapted. 1997 Marty Hall, hall@apl.jhu.edu.

Since:
1.0
